item.title: [317] Equiping Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Okay, so yeah, I am making a private server and I am having a big problem. So I have made a dragon cape and a death cape as custom items and now, when ever I wear them, they always go in the weapon slot but are successfully worn, looking like its in the cape slot. How can I fix this problem?

Thanks,
Arham

P.S:

Here are the codes for them:

Death Cape

if(i == 7778)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5];
class8.anInt174 = 13048;
class8.anInt181 = 2000;
class8.anInt190 = 500;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -6;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt204 = 14;
class8.anInt165 = 14000;
class8.anInt200 = 14000;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.anInt199 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Death Cape”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “The cape worn by masters of PKing.”.getBytes();
}

Dragon Cape

if (i == 14521)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Equip”;
class8.anInt174 = 11111;
class8.anInt165 = 11111;
class8.anInt200 = 11111;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt181 = 400;
class8.anInt190 = 498;
class8.anInt198 = 1300;
class8.anInt169 = -1;
class8.anInt194 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Dragon Cape”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A Cape Designed Like a Dragon.”.getBytes();
}

I am done, please help, thanks!
